HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: DPD 99 kč, PPL 79 kč, Česká pošta 99 kč. Doprava zdarma nad 1 000 Kč (u vybraných dopravců).

PARCEL_SHOPS.locations_count: Zásilkovna: více než 350, PPL Parcelshop: více než 4000 (spolu s Parcelboxy)
PARCEL_SHOPS.pricing: PPL Smart 69 kč, Zásilkovna 75 kč, Česká pošta Balíkovna 79 kč. Doprava zdarma nad 1 000 Kč.

PARCEL_LOCKERS.locations_count: více než 4000 (PPL Parcelbox a Parcelshop dohromady)
PARCEL_LOCKERS.pricing: PPL Smart (Parcelbox/Parcelshop): 69 kč. Doprava zdarma nad 1 000 Kč.

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The store offers Home Delivery, Parcel Shops/Lockers, and In-Store Pickup. No options for bulky items are mentioned.
PROVIDERS: Home delivery is handled by DPD, PPL, and Česká pošta. Parcel points include Zásilkovna, PPL Parcelshop/Parcelbox, and Česká pošta Balíkovna.
PRICING: Prices range from 69 Kč (PPL Smart) to 99 Kč (DPD, Česká pošta). Free shipping is available for orders over 1,000 Kč with selected carriers. Cash on delivery (COD) has a surcharge of 39 Kč.
DELIVERY TIME: Standard delivery time is 2-5 business days. No specific faster express options are detailed.
NOTABLE FEATURES: PPL is described as an 'express' service, but without a specified faster delivery time or extra cost. The store offers a 'buy now, pay later' option through Twisto. Weekend delivery is not available.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: Shipping information is consolidated on a single 'Doprava a platba' page. While most key details are present, the structure could be clearer; pricing is listed separately from the detailed descriptions of each service. Information on pricing for in-store pickup is missing.
